Name: Wager
About the game: A hacker known as goose has compromised your PC with ransomware. Can you make enough coins to pay him off in his game of dice? Find combinations - Which items and bonuses work best together? Strategy options - Choose a different path to victory...or defeat, each time. Roguelite elements - Randomized events, items, and passive bonuses you can get are different each time. Goose is pretty cool.
